statements: DELETE FROM financial_calculators WHERE calculator_name = 'Investment Calculator'
DELETE FROM financial_calculators WHERE data_source = 'External' AND created_at < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM real_time_data WHERE data_source = 'Stocks' AND data_value < 1000;
DELETE FROM financial_calculator_assets WHERE asset_name = 'Stocks' AND asset_value < 10000;
DELETE FROM CalculatorSettings WHERE user_id = 3 AND theme = 'dark';
DELETE FROM CalculatorHistory WHERE user_id = 1 AND calculation_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM UserFavorites WHERE symbol = 'AAPL' OR symbol = 'GOOGL';
